review_data.title: Quick and affordable lunch!
review_data.content: Had lunch with some college friends and it was as it should be: friendly, cozy and tasty! The homemade lasagna and soup are recommended!

review_data.title: Lunch

review_data.title: Keine Gastlichkeit

review_data.title: Crowded, so it must be good
review_data.content: This is a no-frills cafe that has good coffee and salads. It is often crowded at lunch, so go early, or late. Most of the clientele are students, staff, or faculty from the University, so the repeat business suggests that it must be good.

review_data.title: My favourite place in Zurich
review_data.content: I live nearby and really love this place. Its easy and welcoming, just like hanging out with cool friends. The interior is stylish but still cozy and the owners and staff are extremely welcoming and friendly. I like that it is not a classical restaurant...More

review_data.title: Very good and fresh Salads
